cast.overview: Waking Life is about a young man in a persistent lucid dream-like state. The film follows its protagonist as he initially observes and later participates in philosophical discussions that weave together issues like reality, free will, our relationships with others, and the meaning of life.
cast.title: Waking Life
cast.character: Woman Talking to the Novel Writer (as Violet Nichols)

details.biography: Kelly Rebecca Nichols is an American animal rights activist currently serving as head of public relations and media operations for PETA. She is best known as the ex-wife of well-known far-right conspiracy theorist and radio show host Alex Jones.
details.name: Kelly Rebecca Nichols
